Package G31_CENG112_HW2

Class FactoryLine<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • G31_CENG112_HW2.FactoryLine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The argument type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProduct, IQueue<T>
    public class FactoryLine<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProduct, IQueue<T>
    This class implements IProduct and IQueue interfaces, creates the queue according to the circular array format.

      • dequeue

        public T dequeue()
        This method removes the element from the frontIndex. Then manages frontIndex again. If the queue is empty, then throws an exception.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        front The front element is returned.

      • getFront

        public T getFront()
